blockConnection(Map<String, Object>, ISirqulCallback<SirqulResponse>) - Method in class com.sirqul.sdk.api.common.AccountApi
Moves or removes an account into the user's blocked group.

Target API Endpoint: /account/block

Available parameters for this api SirqulKeys.accountId of type Long
the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required) SirqulKeys.accountIdBeingBlocked
the id of the account to be blocked/unblocked SirqulKeys.blockFlagValue
determines whether the account is blocked or unblocked SirqulKeys.removeFromGroupsIfBlocked
determines whether the account is removed from all other groups if blocked SirqulKeys.location of type Location
the current location of the user SirqulResponse subclass type:
a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
blockConnection(Long, Long, Boolean, Boolean, Location) - Method in class com.sirqul.sdk.api.common.AccountApiBase
Moves or removes an account into the user's blocked group.

Target API Endpoint: /account/block

buyWallet(Long, Boolean, Long) - Method in class com.sirqul.sdk.api.billing.WalletApiBase
Deprecated.
use addWallet

Adds an offer to the wallet by going through a purchasing process. The account must have previously set up a payment type that has been validated or they must be using credits previously purchased. The purchase will make a request to the credit card billing system and report the result.
